mapper.select: SELECT project_id AS projectId, project_name AS projectName, app_id AS appId, mch_id AS mchId, secret_key AS secretKey, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM bb_wxpay WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bb_wxpay (project_id, project_name, app_id, mch_id, secret_key) VALUE (#{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{appId}, #{mchId}, #{secretKey})
